thread.title: Abengoa and Shikun & Binui secure $1bn financing for Israeli solar plant
thread.title_full: Abengoa and Shikun & Binui secure $1bn financing for Israeli solar plant

title: Abengoa and Shikun & Binui secure $1bn financing for Israeli solar plant
text:
End date Abengoa and Shikun & Binui secure $1bn financing for Israeli solar plant 
Abengoa and Israeli global infrastructure group, Shikun & Binui, have secured $1 billion in non-recourse financing, for the construction of an Israeli solar-thermal plant. To access this article please sign-in below or register for a free one-month trial. Login
